title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Customer Story: AI Adoption with Salesforce & Amazon Bedrock (AIM267)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 客户案例：Salesforce 与 Amazon Bedrock 的 AI 应用实践 (AIM267)
abstract: Learn how regulated industries use Anthropic on Amazon Bedrock in Agentforce to deploy secure, compliant AI agents, spotlighting our joint customer’s scale success. This presentation is brought to you by Salesforce, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 了解受监管行业如何在 Agentforce 中使用 Amazon Bedrock 上的 Anthropic 来部署安全、合规的 AI 代理，重点展示我们共同客户的规模化成功案例。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Salesforce 为您呈现。
